plan: In the initial rounds, I'll test aggressive strategies by bidding slightly above my value to gather data on opponents' bidding patterns. I'll then alternate with conservative bids, matching my value, to assess the effectiveness of the dominant strategy. Midway, I'll experiment with random bids to disrupt patterns and observe reactions. In the final rounds, I'll refine my approach based on accumulated insights, balancing between aggressive and conservative bids to maximize profit while minimizing risk. Throughout, I'll track opponents' tendencies to adjust my strategy dynamically for optimal long-term gains.

Plan: Start with bidding my value to establish a baseline. In early rounds, experiment with slightly underbidding (e.g., value minus 5) to test if others overbid. Occasionally overbid by a small margin (e.g., value plus 3) to assess competitors' aggressiveness. Monitor opponents' bidding patterns for predictability. Midway, introduce a mixed strategy: alternate between bidding my value and underbidding to gather data on opponents' responses. In later rounds, adjust based on observed patterns, focusing on maximizing profit by balancing risk and reward, potentially incorporating more aggressive bids if it appears profitable.

In the initial rounds, I'll test the dominant strategy by bidding my exact value to establish a baseline. Simultaneously, I'll observe Andy's and Betty's bidding patterns. In subsequent rounds, I'll experiment with slightly overbidding my value when it's high (above $70) to test aggressive strategies. Conversely, I'll underbid when my value is low (below $30) to minimize losses. I'll also try randomizing my bids in mid-value ranges ($30-$70) to gather data on opponents' reactions. This mixed approach will help identify optimal strategies for maximizing long-term profit through adaptive bidding.

In the next rounds, I'll alternate between bidding my exact value and slightly above it. I'll intermittently use random bids to disrupt patterns. Midway, I'll analyze opponents' tendencies and adjust dynamically. In final rounds, I'll focus on maximizing profit by balancing risk and conservative strategies.
